alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 13 at 1:26PM PDT until March 16 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Most of Ventura County south of Lockwood Valley. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. Rivers and creeks that may be affected include the Ventura River, San Antonio Creek, Calleguas Creek, Matilija Creek, and Conejo Creek. There may be mudslides and rockslides, especially in and near steep terrain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
